node.title: 6. Reveling In God's Mercy
node.description:
In pursuing revival, it is easy to start thinking that our salvation depends on our good behavior. In this session we look at what the Bible and SOP say about GodÕs kindness in not only pardoning our sins, but also lovingly granting us the merit of ChristÕs perfect life.
